content: I'm currently running KW V3 coilovers with 450/550 lb/in springs, and I've got my camber set to -1.8 deg front and -1.2 deg rear. I've also got a Whiteline 22mm front sway bar and a Progress 19mm rear sway bar. I've been experimenting with different shock settings, but I'm not sure what's best for autocross. My ride height is around 4.5 inches.
